pkgmetadata.longdescription:
TAUCS is a C library of sparse linear solvers. The current version of the library (1.0) includes the following functionality:
* Multifrontal Supernodal Cholesky Factorization. * Left-Looking Supernodal Cholesky Factorization. * Drop-Tolerance Incomplete-Cholesky Factorization. * Out-of-Core, Left-Looking Supernodal Sparse Cholesky Factorization. * Out-of-Core Sparse LU with Partial Pivoting Factor and Solve. * Ordering Codes and Interfaces to Existing Ordering Codes. * Multilevel-Support-Graph Preconditioners. * Matrix Operations. * Matrix Input/Output. * Matrix Generators. * Iterative Solvers. * Vaidya's Preconditioners. * Recursive Vaidya's Preconditioners. * Multilevel-Support-Graph Preconditioners. * Utility Routines
